Name: Longing in the Tranquil Court
Desc: The silent Razan Garden contains delicately carved stone pots, within which blooming Padisarahs sleep. They appear in prime condition and their lilac color is fresh and ripe, as if they had been tended with the greatest care...\nTubby remains puzzled about the plant nutrients Padisarahs need. Therefore, even with the power of Sub-Space Creation, she is unable to cultivate the original Padisarahs in the fields of The Realm Within, only replicating flowers with a similar appearance...
